title: Cocktail Consistency Across Multiple Bartenders
system_mod: Prioritize language that empowers bartenders instead of policing them. Recommend systems and tools, not blame.
venue_context: Small gastropub with multiple bartenders at 15 seat bar with one bartender on service well along with 4 seats with the other bartender serving the other 11 seats.
prompt: Our bartenders are making the same drinks a little differently: different shake strength, garnish, even slightly off specs. How can we tighten consistency across the team without killing creativity?
